title: Search
lead:
Explore our resources, embedded in the CLARIN and DARIAH research infrastructures: These tools and services are provided via the SSH Open Marketplace, via DARIAH Campus, as well as via the Digital Humanities Course Registry (DHCR).
Additionally, you might as well undertake a full text search and look for content provided on this CLARIAH-AT website, including static pages and any content featured in events and news.
